sentences.sContent: Many workers go home from their first day on the job with either a bad headache or a backache—undoubtedly the result of nervous tension.
sentences.sContent_eng: Many workers go home from their first day on the job with either a bad headache or a backache—undoubtedly the result of nervous tension.
sentences.sCn: 许多员工在第一天上班的时候会带着头痛或背痛回家，这无疑就是紧张情绪造成的结果。

sentences.sContent: This may cause stomach upset, ulcers, headache, backache, high blood pressure and in severe cases can lead to panic attacks or a panic disorder.
sentences.sContent_eng: This may cause stomach upset, ulcers, headache, backache, high blood pressure and in severe cases can lead to panic attacks or a panic disorder.
sentences.sCn: 这可能会引起胃部不适，溃疡，头痛，背痛，高血压，甚至在严重的情况下可能导致惊恐发作或惊恐障碍等疾病。
